title: Replace Health Insights tile 'Energy Levels' with 'PCOD & PCOS Risks'

requirements.text: In the Health Insights section of the dashboard, replace the existing "Energy Levels" insight tile with a new tile labeled "PCOD & PCOS Risks".

quotes: in health insight can you  replace the energy level to pcod & pcos risks

acceptanceCriteria: On the /home dashboard, within the "Health Insights" grid, the tile label reads "PCOD & PCOS Risks" instead of "Energy Levels".
No other tiles in the "Health Insights" section are removed or renamed.

requirements.text: Update the click handler/logging for the replaced Health Insights tile so it no longer references energy predictions and instead references PCOD & PCOS risks (user-facing text remains unchanged aside from the tile label).

quotes: replace the energy level to pcod & pcos risks

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the "PCOD & PCOS Risks" tile triggers a handler/log message that references PCOD & PCOS risks rather than energy.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not implement a new backend ML model or API for PCOD/PCOS risk calculation as part of this change.
Do not add new routes/pages for PCOD/PCOS unless explicitly requested.
